#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
int main()
{
		int tc,i,l,m,mod=8388608;
		long long int n,s=0,t,k;
		//printf("Enter the no of test cases\n");
		long long int a[22]={1,7,31,111,351,1023,2815,7423,18943,47103,114687,274431,647167,1507327,3473407,7929855,1179647,6815743,6291455,7340031,6291455,8388607};
		scanf("%d",&tc);
		while(tc--)
		{
			s=0;
			//printf("Enter the value of n \n");
			scanf("%lld",&n);
			if(n>=22)
			{printf("8388607\n");}
			else
			{	
				printf("%lld\n",a[n-1]);
			}	
	
	}
	return 0;

	
}
